title: San Francisco Things to Do in January
seo_title: San Francisco Things to Do in January
meta_description: Are you traveling to San Francisco and staying at our Nob Hill hotel this January? Then you will love this blog post. We are sharing our favorite things happening in January 2017.
short_description: Are you traveling to San Francisco and staying at our Nob Hill hotel this January? Then you will love this blog post. We are sharing our favorite things happening in January 2017.
long_description:
Are you traveling to San Francisco and staying at our Nob Hill hotel this January? Then you will love this blog post. We are sharing our favorite things happening in January 2017.

 

No Pants Bart Ride

Sunday, January 10 at 2pm

 

Start the new year off with something bold– no pants on Bart. Join the masses as they coordinate their pantsless Bart ride with a straight face. Hey, we’re not saying you have to do it– our job is to just share what’s happening!

 

Read more on the No Pants! Facebook page here.

 

San Francisco Restaurants Week

January 18-29, 2017

 

San Francisco Restaurants Week is a celebration of San Francisco’s world-class dining community. Nearly 130 restaurants around San Francisco offer pre-fixe menus to showcase their passion for sharing great food with others.

 

Read more on the San Francisco Restaurants Week website here.

 

Kathy Griffin

Saturday, January 21

Masonic Auditorium

 

Just a block away from our Nob Hill hotel is the iconic Masonic Auditorium. In January comedian Kathy Griffin will be there. Book your stay with us and just walk to the venue. View our Packages and Specials here.

 

See the view Masonic Auditorium schedule here.
